summary: The Ottoman leadership entrusts Antar with the task of preventing the Pasha of Bagdad from using local leader Mustapha's united hill tribes against the Ottoman Sultan.
cast: Victor Mature|Mari Blanchard|Virginia Field|Guy Rolfe|James Arness|Leon Askin|Gregg Palmer|Nick Cravat|Ludwig Donath|Howard Petrie|Charles Arnt|Jackie Loughery|Thomas Browne Henry|Sammy Stein|Robert Blake|David Sharpe|Glenn Strange|Charles Wagenheim|Chester Hayes|Thomas A. Renesto|Hans Schnabel|Vic Holbrook|Emile Avery|Herman Belmonte|Bruce Cameron|Fred Carson|Martin Cichy|Jimmy Dime|Ernie Flatt|Al Haskell|Alan Jackson|George J. Lewis|Merrill McCormick|Jack Perry|Walter Pietila|Ed Randolph|The Russ Saunders Troupe|Ray Saunders|Russell Saunders|Carl Sklover|Robert St. Angelo|Paul Stathes|Patty Taylor|Dale Van Sickel|Wally Walker|Ben Welden|Stuart Whitman
title: The Veils of Bagdad
